INSERT INTO place (user_no, place_name, place_tel, latitude, longitude, address, capacity, start_time, end_time, place_price) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{placeName}, #{placeTel}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{address}, #{capacity}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{placePrice}, #{placeExp})
mapper.select: SELECT tag_contents AS content, tag_category AS category FROM hash_tag_list
SELECT place_no, place_name, address, resv_date FROM VIEW_history__project_db__suggestion__place WHERE user_no = #{userNo} and isresv = 'Y'
SELECT place_name FROM place where place_no = #{placeNo}

SELECT DISTINCT name, resv_date, message, isresv, place_no, mem_cnt FROM suggestion a, user b, customer_req c WHERE (a.user_no = b.user_no and a.user_no = c.user_no ) and date(resv_date) > date(now()) and a.place_no=#{placeNo}

select p.place_no AS placeNo, place_name AS placeName, address, p.start_time AS startTime, p.end_time AS endTime, avg(star) AS star, p.place_exp AS placeExp from place p, review r where r.place_no=p.place_no group by p.place_no order by avg(star) desc limit 3;
